name: Intro
_source: speak;Reisen;*Huff* *Puff* {c:wait;400}{tgm} Master! It's the Shrine Maiden{c:wait;200}{tgm} - She's heading this way!
speak;Eirin;Hmm, this is certainly not ideal. Right when I was on the verge of a breakthrough regarding those patients.
speak;Reisen;They...{c:wait;200}{tgm} also escaped during the skirmish. With all due respect, Master, aren't you concerned?
speak;Eirin;...{c:wait;100}{tgm}A minor miscalculation, but thankfully, the error is negligible.
speak;Eirin;Oh, did I say something? Besides, with the exception of those two fairies,|all the other patients were catatonic upon arrival. I doubt they will do much harm.
speak;Reisen;That's reassuring, but what about the "code red" heading for us right now?
speak;Eirin;I'm currently looking at the solution.
speak;Reisen;N-no, I heard you right. But you want *me* to fight *her*?

speak;Eirin;You are capable enough, no? To reassure you, I've run the numbers as well. You have a 99.7% chance of purchasing me enough time to carry out my business...{c:wait;200}{tgm} with three standard deviations of course.
speak;Reisen;I can't tell if you are praising or insulting me.
speak;Reisen;Wait, so you aren't going to fight then?
speak;Eirin;No, I have much more... urgent business to attend to. Do not worry, it will not take long, so I believe you can manage. Good luck, Udongein.
speak;Reisen;*Sigh*...{c:wait;200}{tgm} Just my luck, but I can't help it I guess. Alright...{c:wait;200}{tgm}
speak;Marisa;Man, I just felt a chill in the room.
speak;Reimu;It's almost like something absolutely annoying is about to happen.
speak;Marisa;Come on, Reimu. You know what they say about jinxes, right?
speak;Reimu;That you can split disposable chopsticks perfectly with them?
speak;Marisa;What kind of jinx is that?
speak;Kasen;I concur with Marisa. We should not be tempting fate right now.
speak;Reimu;Well, with a certain vampire here, we can do it as much as we want! Who's gonna stop u-
speak;Marisa;...{c:wait;300}{tgm}And superstition marches on. Guess we are doing this thing again. Least it ain't me this time!
speak;;This map's clear bonus is 375 Bonus EXP, with a decrease of 75 BExp per turn you take over 20 turns!;;;hint
